hooks.command: bash -c 'file_path=$(echo "$0" | jq -r ".tool_input.file_path // \"\"" 2>/dev/null || echo ""); if [[ "$file_path" =~ \.py$ ]] || [[ "$DEVBOX_ENV" == "python" ]] || [[ -f "/workspace/pyproject.toml" ]]; then echo "ðŸ Auto-formatting Python files..." && cd /workspace && devbox run format --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$file_path" =~ \.(ts|js|tsx|jsx)$ ]] || [[ "$DEVBOX_ENV" == "typescript" ]] || [[ -f "/workspace/package.json" ]]; then echo "ðŸ“˜ Auto-formatting TypeScript/JavaScript files..." && cd /workspace && devbox run format --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$file_path" =~ \.rs$ ]] || [[ "$DEVBOX_ENV" == "rust" ]] || [[ -f "/workspace/Cargo.toml" ]]; then echo "ðŸ¦€ Auto-formatting Rust files..." && cd /workspace && devbox run format --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$file_path" =~ \.go$ ]] || [[ "$DEVBOX_ENV" == "go" ]] || [[ -f "/workspace/go.mod" ]]; then echo "ðŸ¹ Auto-formatting Go files..." && cd /workspace && devbox run format --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$file_path" =~ \.nu$ ]] || [[ "$DEVBOX_ENV" == "nushell" ]] || [[ -d "/workspace/scripts" ]]; then echo "ðŸš Auto-formatting Nushell files..." && cd /workspace && devbox run format --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; fi'

bash -c 'file_path=$(echo "$0" | jq -r ".tool_input.file_path // \"\"" 2>/dev/null || echo ""); if [[ "$file_path" =~ test.*\.py$|.*_test\.py$|.*\.test\.py$ ]]; then echo "ðŸ§ª Running Python tests..." && cd /workspace && devbox run test --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$file_path" =~ .*\.(test|spec)\.(ts|js)$|.*\.test\.(tsx|jsx)$ ]]; then echo "ðŸ§ª Running TypeScript/JavaScript tests..." && cd /workspace && devbox run test --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$file_path" =~ .*_test\.rs$|tests/.*\.rs$ ]]; then echo "ðŸ§ª Running Rust tests..." && cd /workspace && devbox run test --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$file_path" =~ .*_test\.go$|.*\.test\.go$ ]]; then echo "ðŸ§ª Running Go tests..." && cd /workspace && devbox run test --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$file_path" =~ test.*\.nu$|.*_test\.nu$ ]]; then echo "ðŸ§ª Running Nushell tests..." && cd /workspace && devbox run test --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; fi'

hooks.command: bash -c 'command=$(echo "$0" | jq -r ".tool_input.command // \"\"" 2>/dev/null || echo ""); if [[ "$command" =~ git.*commit ]]; then echo "ðŸ” Running pre-commit validation..." && cd /workspace && if [[ "$DEVBOX_ENV" == "python" ]] || [[ -f "pyproject.toml" ]]; then devbox run lint --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$DEVBOX_ENV" == "typescript" ]] || [[ -f "package.json" ]]; then devbox run lint --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$DEVBOX_ENV" == "rust" ]] || [[ -f "Cargo.toml" ]]; then devbox run lint --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$DEVBOX_ENV" == "go" ]] || [[ -f "go.mod" ]]; then devbox run lint --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$DEVBOX_ENV" == "nushell" ]] || [[ -d "scripts" ]]; then devbox run check --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; else echo "Running devbox validation..."; devbox run validate --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; fi; fi'

PostToolUse_FailureHandling.// Failure Pattern Learning Hook: Analyzes command failures to learn patterns and improve future error handling
PostToolUse_FailureHandling.// Environment Detection: Automatically detects environment context (python, typescript, rust, go, nushell)
PostToolUse_FailureHandling.// Data Collection: Records command, exit code, output, and environment for pattern analysis
PostToolUse_FailureHandling.// AI Learning: Uses collected data to provide intelligent failure analysis and solution suggestions
PostToolUse_FailureHandling.// Trigger Condition: Only activates when command exit code is non-zero (failure detected)

hooks.command: bash -c 'exit_code=$(echo "$0" | jq -r ".exit_code // 0" 2>/dev/null || echo "0"); if [[ "$exit_code" != "0" ]]; then command=$(echo "$0" | jq -r ".tool_input.command // \"\"" 2>/dev/null || echo ""); output=$(echo "$0" | jq -r ".tool_result.stderr // .tool_result.stdout // \"\"" 2>/dev/null || echo ""); environment="$DEVBOX_ENV"; if [[ -z "$environment" ]]; then if [[ -f "/workspace/pyproject.toml" ]]; then environment="python"; elif [[ -f "/workspace/package.json" ]]; then environment="typescript"; elif [[ -f "/workspace/Cargo.toml" ]]; then environment="rust"; elif [[ -f "/workspace/go.mod" ]]; then environment="go"; elif [[ -d "/workspace/scripts" ]]; then environment="nushell"; else environment="unknown"; fi; fi; echo "ðŸš¨ Command failure detected in $environment environment, analyzing pattern..."; echo "$(date): $environment: $command: $exit_code: $output" >> /workspace/.claude/failure-patterns.log 2>/dev/null || echo "Failure pattern analysis completed"; fi'
